title: The Journey
subtitle: Flammarion to Walston
description: The Travellers learn of their inheritance and travel from Flammarion to Walston, passing through the frontier waypoint of 567-908.
dramatic_purpose: Exposition - establish characters, motivation, and setting
narrator_notes: This act sets the stage. The Travellers are starting a journey that will test them. Emphasize the vastness of space and the modest nature of frontier travel. The Autumn Gold is a working ship, not luxury transport.
